title: Challenge Modifiers
illegalEvolution:
{{pokemon}} changed into an ineligble pokémon
for this challenge!

singleGeneration.name: Mono Gen
singleGeneration.desc: You can only use Pokémon from Generation {{gen}}.
singleGeneration.desc_default: You can only use Pokémon from the chosen generation.

singleType.name: Mono Type
singleType.desc: You can only use Pokémon with the {{type}} type.
singleType.desc_default: You can only use Pokémon of the chosen type.

freshStart.name: Fresh Start
freshStart.desc: You can only use the original starters, and only as if you had just started PokéRogue.

inverseBattle.name: Inverse Battle
inverseBattle.desc:
Type matchups are reversed and no type is immune to any other type.
Disables other challenges' achievements.
